officialTitle: The MOM Program Continuation - 8 Year Follow-up
summary: Study measures will evaluate cognitive, academic, and behavioral outcomes for the children, school services received, and caregiver stress and depression. The main study outcome measures include cognitive status, school functioning, and behavior. Long-term outcomes will be studied in attempt to verify the 33 and 60 month significant differences found in school participation and behavior between the intervention and control groups.

primaryOutcome.measure: Woodcock-Johnson Cognitive Ability Test, 3rd Edition (WJR-III, Cog)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 8 years post original enrollment in study
